fullplot: It's November 1989, and the Berlin Wall is falling. In Stavanger, Norway, teenage boy Jarle has a great new girlfriend and is starting a rock band with his buddies. But when a new boy, the synth pop-listening Yngve, joins his class, Jarle is more fascinated than he wants to be, and the world as he knows it starts to crumble.
plot: A teenage boy loses his footing when he finds himself drawn to the new boy in class.
title: The Man Who Loved Yngve
